title: David Bowie - 1990-08-29 - Sportstadion - Linz Austria
description:
Another very nice David Bowie show, check my account for more Bowie bootlegs.

Please enjoy, share with friends and please seed :) Thanks!


David Bowie
Live at the Sportstadion, Linz, Austria on 29th August 1990

Audio source: Audience recording
Linage: AUD(M) ---> CDR(?) ---> WAV ---> FLAC 8 ---> MWP
Number of discs: 2
Artwork: none
Total running time: 67m 16s / 23m 22s

Info: This recording is sourced from the master analog tape, and was
sent on CDR to me at the end of the 1990s by the taper himself: Karlheinz.

I am sure he is also member of MWP, therefore a BIG THANK YOU from me.

Somehow strange, it seems that after this (master) recording of the concert 
was made available for Bowie traders/collectors worldwide some 10 years ago, 
only inferior versions of this very good recording are now floating around?

That is a shame, because this is certainly one of the better recordings 
of the Sound+Vision 1990 World Tour.


Tracklisting (disc one):
01. intro (Ode an die Freunde) / Space Oddity
02. Rebel Rebel
03. Ashes to Ashes
04. Life On Mars?
05. Stay
06. Pretty Pink Rose
07. Blue Jean
08. Let's Dance
09. Sound and Vision
10. Ziggy Stardust
11. China Girl
12. Station to Station
13. Young Americans
14. Suffragette City

Tracklisting (disc two):
01. Fame '90
02. "Heroes"
03. Changes
04. White Light/White Heat
04. The Jean Genie/Gloria
